postTitle: A New Sherif Is Now in Town: SUNO Appoints A New Vice-Chancellor
postDesc: Summit University, Offa has appointed Prof. Abiodun Musa Aibinu - a professor of mechatronics engineering - as the university's second vice-chancellor.

postTitle: Formal Inauguration and Maiden Matriculation Programme Ceremony.
postDesc: It was a historical day for the entire staff and students of Summit University, Offa as the university community had its inauguration and matriculation ceremony.
A 60 Bed-space Hostel was donated by ADSN Lagos State Council to Summit University.
The family of Alhaja Adiat Abegbe Makanjuola gifted a 500-capacity Lecture Theatre to Summit in her name.
UNESCO Consultant and former Executive Secretary, National Universities Commission, Professor Peter Okebukola paid a visit to Summit University, Offa.
The university organized a matriculation ceremony for the newly admitted students to welcome them into the campus.

postTitle: Students and Staff At The Maiden Orientation Exercise.
postDesc: The maiden orientation exercise at the university witnessed the joint participation of both the students and staff.
